ModMetaData.name: [XND] Watermill Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Current Version: v1.1 (16th July 2018)\n\nChanges the watermill generator in several different ways: * It now requires a research project called 'Hydroelectricity' * Increases its base power production from 1100W to 1400W * Its power production decreases if temperatures are bad * Adds a new incident which affects watermill generators, both good and bad
